items.sentence: Please put your shoes in the shoebox when you take them off.
I've told Tom many times that smoking is bad for his health.
When Tom was younger, he used to play basketball quite well.
There's nothing more fun for me to do than to talk with Tom.
What kind of work did you do when you were living in Boston?
I'd rather live in peaceful poverty than in wealth and fear.
The woman who was sitting between Tom and Mary is my mother.
I've already forgotten what I was going to remind you to do.
The explanations are too elaborate and should be simplified.
I don't have any more room on my shelves for any more books.
